roleset.name: not occuring in direct response to exertion

role.descr: thing that occurs not in response to exertion

example.text: They are typically nonexertional though tend to occur more often at the end of the day if she does too much activity .
example.arg: though tend to occur more often at the end of the day if she does too much activity

roleset.note: NONEXERTIONAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmrpl1to8. Relation to 'exert.01'. (from nonexertional.01-j)
